code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Button,TextField}from'@mui/material';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function MoodInput(_ref){let{onSubmit}=_ref;const[mood,setMood]=useState('');const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();onSubmit(mood);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{label:"How are you feeling today?",variant:"outlined",fullWidth:true,value:mood,onChange:e=>setMood(e.target.value),style:{marginBottom:'10px'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{type:"submit",variant:"contained",color:"primary",fullWidth:true,children:"Get Music Recommendations"})]});}export default MoodInput;
